alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 30 at 3:11PM CST until December 01 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility less than one-half mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...In Louisiana, West Cameron, East Cameron and Southern Calcasieu Parishes. In Texas, Lower Jefferson and Southern Orange Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the Dense Fog Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron
